page.title: 06A typical School Day - 1
page.content: {_9.00}Arrive at school after having travelled by car, bus or foot. { }All children enter playground. Monitors enter school to put down chairs. If wet,children enter classroom and chat. { 9.00}Registration (children answer their names). { 9.10}Read library books and have Assembly. Assembly taken by a Reverend. { 9.45}Maths. Class divides into 3 groups according to ability. Pupils work from the School Maths Project cards. There is no Maths on Friday. {10.45}First breaktime of the day, pupils may bring fruit to eat. They sit on the wall or talk to friends. They play games like Victory or Hot Chocolate.
